Name: Coffin panel
Description: A footboard from a coffin, made from a piece of wood with linen stretched over it and then painted. The scene depicts an Apis bull with a black and white patterned hide, he carries a mummy on his back and is shown leaping. The body is white with black features and red detail on the wrapping.It is only from the 22nd Dynasty onwards that Apis was represented on private coffins, serving as an escort to the Afterlife and protector of the dead.
